text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Commission may:
adopt regulations and conditions to govern racing and betting on racing in the State; and
approve or disapprove:
prices that a licensee may set for admission to a race, a service performed, or an article sold at a track; and
the size of the purse, reward, or stake to be offered at a race.

The Commission may not adopt regulations that allow:
racing a breed of horse not now authorized by law; or
holding currently unauthorized:
intertrack betting;
off-track betting; or
telephone betting other than telephone account betting.
